STUDY ON FEASIBILITY OF MEASURING INDIVIDUAL STUDENT ACADEMIC ACHIEVEMENT. The Secretary of Education will conduct a study to assess measuring student academic achievement individually over time to determine school progress. Privacy issues regarding access to student information will be considered. The Secretary of Education will submit a report to Congress on the study results of measuring student academic achievement and ensuring confidentiality within one year of the Act's enactment.
